content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 4, Borussia Dortmund 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 4, Borussia Dortmund 0.
Attempt blocked. Jannik Bandowski (Borussia Dortmund) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ciro Immobile.
Substitution, Liverpool. Martin Kelly replaces Javier Manquillo.
Martin Skrtel (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dong-Won Ji (Borussia Dortmund).
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Nico Knystock replaces Sokratis.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Marian Sarr replaces Marcel Schmelzer.
Offside, Borussia Dortmund. Jannik Bandowski tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Ciro Immobile (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Dong-Won Ji.
Substitution, Liverpool. Joe Allen replaces Jordan Henderson.
Offside, Liverpool. Raheem Sterling tries a through ball, but Rickie Lambert is caught offside.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Mustafa Amini replaces Milos Jojic.
Substitution, Liverpool. Rickie Lambert replaces Daniel Sturridge.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Dejan Lovren.
Attempt blocked. Ciro Immobile (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Milos Jojic.

Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Jannik Bandowski replaces Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.

Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Raheem Sterling.
Attempt missed. Sokratis (Borussia Dortmund) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Milos Jojic with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Dejan Lovren.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Dong-Won Ji replaces Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Kevin Großkreutz (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lucas Leiva (Liverpool).
Substitution, Liverpool. José Enrique replaces Glen Johnson.
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Borussia Dortmund 0. Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Daniel Sturridge.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Kevin Großkreutz replaces Lukasz Piszczek because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Attempt blocked. Glen Johnson (Liverpool) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Steven Gerrard.
Corner,  Borussia Dortmund. Conceded by Lucas Leiva.
Foul by Lucas Leiva (Liverpool).
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ciro Immobile.
Attempt saved. Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sven Bender (Borussia Dortmund).
Attempt saved. Raheem Sterling (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Glen Johnson.
Goal!  Liverpool 3, Borussia Dortmund 0. Philippe Coutinho (Liverpool) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Second Half begins Liverpool 2, Borussia Dortmund 0.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Sven Bender replaces Sebastian Kehl.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Ciro Immobile replaces Adrián Ramos.
Substitution, Liverpool. Lucas Leiva replaces Emre Can.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Jonas Hofmann replaces Oliver Kirch.
First Half ends, Liverpool 2, Borussia Dortmund 0.
